SEARCH
Package control

Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
control.ApplicationManager
public class ApplicationManager extends Object
Application Manager - Handles application-related operations

Responsibilities include submitting applications, approving/rejecting applications, accepting placements, managing withdrawals, and retrieving statistics.

  • Method Details

    • submitApplication

      public Application submitApplication(String studentID, String internshipID)
      Submit an application for an internship

      Performs multiple checks:

      • Student eligibility
      • Internship availability
      • Duplicate applications
      Parameters:
      studentID - student ID
      internshipID - internship ID
      Returns:
      application if successful, null otherwise

    • acceptPlacement

      public boolean acceptPlacement(String applicationID, String studentID)
      Accept internship placement (by student)

      Accepting a placement will withdraw all other applications automatically.

      Parameters:
      applicationID - application ID
      studentID - student accepting
      Returns:
      true if accepted successfully

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(String applicationID, String studentID, String reason)
      Request withdrawal from an application
      Parameters:
      applicationID - application ID
      studentID - student requesting withdrawal
      reason - withdrawal reason
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal requested successfully

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(String applicationID)
      Approve withdrawal request (by career center staff) Updates student and internship records accordingly.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - application ID
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal approved
